text.directorsDescription: Add all of the directors of the company.
text.imShareholder: I own 25% or more of the company
text.shareholdersDescription:
Add all of the natural persons that own or control,
directly or indirectly more than 25% of the company.
text.websiteBasicRequirementDescription:
This list is intended only as a basic pre-entry check of the
websites and does not refer to specific product
application requirements.
text.websiteBasicRequirementHint: This list is intended only as a basic pre-entry check of the websites and does not refer to specific product application requirements.
text.declarationOfAccuracyDescription: By checking the checkbox below I/we hereby declare that the information which was submitted in the attached Merchant application is truthful and genuine in regards to my/our business, legal status and registration, business practices and all other submitted information.
text.emailDescription: By clicking 'Finish', an email containing an identity verification link will be sent to the shareholders listed.
text.name: Name
text.hasActiveWebsite: I declare that the website's business activity does not require a license
text.storeInfoDescription: Leaving the last checkbox 'Unchecked' will require providing extra licenses documents

error.productQuantity: Product quantity should be a valid number.
error.productPrice: Product price should be a valid number.
error.productDescription: Product description should not be empty.
error.websiteLanguage: Website language should not be empty.
error.monthlySalesVolume: Monthly Sales Volume must be positive.
error.monthlyTransactions: Monthly Number Of Transactions must be positive.
error.averageTicketAmount: Average Ticket Amount must be positive.
error.spikeSalesAverageVolume: Spike Sales Volume must be positive.
error.spikeTransactionNumber: Spike Transaction Number must be positive.

required.phone: A valid phone number is required.
required.registeredCapitalInUsd: Registered capital in USD is required.
required.mobileAppName: Mobile App Name should not be empty.
required.hasMobileApp: Information on mobile app availability is required.
required.monthlyTransactions: Monthly Number Of Transactions is required.
required.spikeSalesAverageVolume: Spike Sales Average Volume is required.
required.volumeInRegion: Split of volume by regions is required.

minLength.firstName: First name must be at least 2 characters long.
minLength.lastName: Last name must be at least 2 characters long.
minLength.jobTitle: Job title must be at least 2 characters long.
minLength.businessType: Business type should have at least 3 characters.
minLength.taxIdentificationNumber: Tax ID should have at least 8 characters.
minLength.companyName: Company name should have at least 2 characters.
minLength.country: Country code should have exactly 2 characters.
minLength.city: City should be at least 2 characters long.
minLength.street: Street should be at least 3 characters long.
minLength.registrationNumber: Registration number should have at least 4 characters.
minLength.nationalId: Identity number should be at least 5 characters long.
minLength.nationality: Invalid nationality. Please select from the available options.
minLength.fullAddress: Full address should be at least 10 characters long.
minLength.holderName: Holder name should be at least 5 characters long.
minLength.holderFullAddress: Holder full address should be at least 10 characters long.
minLength.accountNumber: Account number should be at least 6 characters long.
minLength.iban: IBAN should be at least 15 characters long.
minLength.swiftCode: SWIFT code should be at least 8 characters long.
minLength.routeNumber: Route Number should be at least 8 characters long.
minLength.bankName: Bank name should be at least 3 characters long.
minLength.bankCode: Bank Code should be at least 2 characters long.
minLength.bankAddress: Bank address should be at least 10 characters long.
minLength.websiteUrls: Website URL(s) should not be empty.
minLength.mainWebsite: Main Website should not be empty.
minLength.returnPolicyUrl: Return Policy URL should not be empty.
minLength.shippingPolicyUrl: Shipping Policy URL should not be empty.
minLength.aboutUsUrl: About Us URL should not be empty.
minLength.termsOfUseUrl: Terms of Use URL should not be empty.
minLength.privacyPolicyUrl: Privacy Policy URL should not be empty.

maxLength.firstName: First name should not exceed 50 characters.
maxLength.lastName: Last name should not exceed 50 characters.
maxLength.businessType: Business type should not exceed 50 characters.
maxLength.taxIdentificationNumber: Tax ID should not exceed 15 characters.
maxLength.companyName: Company name should not exceed 100 characters.
maxLength.country: Country code should have exactly 2 characters.
maxLength.streetNumber: Street number should not exceed 10 characters.
maxLength.registrationNumber: Registration number should not exceed 20 characters.
maxLength.nationalId: Identity number should not exceed 20 characters.
maxLength.fullAddress: Full address should not exceed 200 characters.
maxLength.holderName: Holder name should not exceed 50 characters.
maxLength.holderFullAddress: Holder full address should not exceed 200 characters.
maxLength.accountNumber: Account number should not exceed 34 characters.
maxLength.swiftCode: SWIFT code should not exceed 11 characters.
maxLength.routeNumber: Route Number should not exceed 10 characters.
maxLength.bankName: Bank name should not exceed 100 characters.
maxLength.bankCode: Bank Code should not exceed 13 characters.
maxLength.bankAddress: Bank address should not exceed 200 characters.

pattern.phone: Phone number must be 10 to 15 digits long and may start with a +.
pattern.taxIdentificationNumber: Tax ID must be in valid format.
pattern.country: Please enter a valid country code.
pattern.websiteUrls: Website URL(s) should be valid URL(s) separated by comma.
pattern.mainWebsite: Main Website should be a valid URL.
pattern.returnPolicyUrl: Return Policy URL should be a valid URL.
pattern.shippingPolicyUrl: Shipping Policy URL should be a valid URL.
pattern.aboutUsUrl: About Us URL should be a valid URL.
pattern.termsOfUseUrl: Terms of Use URL should be a valid URL.
pattern.privacyPolicyUrl: Privacy Policy URL should be a valid URL.

type.dateOfBirth: Date of birth must be a string.
type.numberOfEmployees: Number of employees must be a number.

minimum.numberOfEmployees: Number of employees must be at least 1.
minimum.percentageOfOwnership: Percentage of ownership must be 25 or greater.

maximum.percentageOfOwnership: Percentage of ownership must not exceed 100.
